event.title: Monthly Fellowship meeting in Berlin, Germany

body.p: This month again, the Berlin Fellowship meeting will be in the Newthinking Store, in the Tucholskystr. 48, 10117 Berlin. We'll be there from 19:30. Ali G端nd端z will make a presentation there on "Free Software GSM". The talk will be aimed at those without any prior knowledge of GSM protocols. "You have gotten used to the idea of Android and Meego? Let's see what you'll think about the possibility of Free Software handling what your cell phone is primarily made for" announces Ali G端nd端z. As usual, this invitation is for everyone interested in the FSFE or Free Software. We're looking forward to seeing you there!
